oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Howard Chapel AME: fieldnotes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Howard Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church
Fieldnotes of Howard Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church. Notes document the location of the church in relation to Golden Eagle Lodge 110 and Third Avenue Baptist Church.

Howard Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church is located in the small town of Huntingdon. It is adjacent to Golden Eagle Lodge 110, a Masonic lodge, and Third Avenue Baptist Church. At the time of fieldwork, it was noted that Howard Chapel AME resembled a school or lodge. Since the 1998 fieldwork, the building has acquired a gable-roofed vestibule and features a "Faith Deliverance Ministeries"sign above the doorway.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African American Churches -- Tennessee
